item.title: Almost-Linear RNNs Yield Highly Interpretable Symbolic Codes in Dynamical Systems Reconstruction
item.description: Almost-linear RNNs (AL-RNNs) offer highly interpretable symbolic codes for dynamical systems reconstruction, simplifying the analysis of complex systems.
